Classes and objects document how the programmer thinks about the problem that he is given. That may be the right way of thinking about it, or it may be the wrong way. It will compile well structured and poorly structured programs equally easily.

Methods are way to retrieve or insert or delete data or perform any other operation on these objects(rows).
